amendment.description: to express the sense of the Senate that the total amount of payments to States from the Water Pollution Control State Revolving Fund should be increased to $1,350,000,000.

vote.text: Amendment SA 261 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 261 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Chafee. to express the sense of the Senate that the total amount of payments to States from the Water Pollution Control State Revolving Fund should be increased to $1,350,000,000.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 261 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 261 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Chafee.
